Social Projects

  • Home
  • What we do
  • Social Projects

Current Projects

Creative Cycle

Creative Cycle is a project which promotes up-cycling and provides vulnerable women in London with the technical and entrepreneurial skills to expand their businesses onto the online market.

In 2014, we held workshops and mentoring sessions to drastically improve the confidence and standard of living of 3 women from Eaves by allowing them to have a more stable source of income.

Join Creative Cycle

Pathways

Pathways is a student mentoring scheme designed to raise aspirations of young people in deprived areas.

In 2014, we worked in conjunction with other organisations (e.g. Into University, RBS) to work with 30 teenagers and 26 children on thinking about access to university and other routes.

Join Pathways

Gates to Knowledge

Gates to Knowledge is a project aiming to allow a secular school for underprivileged minority children in New Delhi become financially sustainable.

It was set up in 2014 and the team provided a series of business proposals for the school. The team travelled to Delhi in August 2014 to conduct first stage of the project.

Join Gates to Knowledge

Your Project Here

Starting a new project is easy. We will be there every step of the way to guide you and to provide you with the necessary resources for your idea to take off.

Start a New Project
